summary: The Retirement Investment Choice Act (H.R. 5748) aims to codify Executive Order 14330, which focuses on providing 401(k) investors with greater access to alternative assets. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on October 14, 2025, by Mr. Downing and co-sponsors, was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce and the Committee on Financial Services. The bill's short title is the Retirement Investment Choice Act.
